discord_options.bot_prefix: The prefix what your bot uses/listens. I'm using '!'
discord_options.catalogs: The count of catalogs. Command !finskubot uses that information
discord_options.bot_owner: The user ID of bot's master without '<@' and '>'
discord_options.bot_homeserver: The guild ID of bot's home server without '<@' and '>'
discord_options.bot_homechannel: The text channel ID where bot reports bot info

channels: #Channel name(s) what bot spys. For example '#channelname'
